title: Thondaman backs Ranil
body_lines: Leader of the Ceylon Workers Congress (CWC) and MP Jeevan Thondaman yesterday assured support to the new Premier Ranil Wickremesinghe.

“I wish @RW_UNP the best on becoming the PM. However, there are many issues that need to be addressed without delay and I assure the fullest cooperation of the Ceylon Workers’ Congress in your effort to overcome those issues and stabilise our nation,” Jeevan said
